                                                                      # vscode-setting-json

                                                                      网上关于vscode.setting资料不全，个人整理了常用配置，如eslint自动修复，包括html,js单引号变双引号，函数名前一个空格，自动缩进4，去除末尾逗号，增加末尾空行，html属性强制换行，移除多行空行，补全末尾分号等等，可以参考如下： 

                                                                      {    // 配置ssss编译
    // "easysass.excludeRegex": "commonMixin",
    // "easysass.formats": [
    //     {
    //         "format": "compressed", //压缩格式的 css 代码(代码风格)
    //         "extension": ".min.css",
    //     }
    // ],
    // 配置vscode服务器https
    // "liveServer.settings.https": {
    //     "enable": false, //将其设置为true以启用该功能。
    //     "cert": " E:\\OpenSSL-Win64\\bin\\server-cert.pem", //完整路径
    //     "key": " E:\\OpenSSL-Win64\\bin\\server-key.pem", //完整路径
    //     "passphrase": " 123456"
    // },
    // 配置粘贴图片控件
    // "pasteImage.filePathConfirmInputBoxMode": "onlyName",
    // "pasteImage.path": "${currentFileNameWithoutExt}",
    // 配置文件代码作者信息
    // "fileheader.customMade": {
    //     "Description": "",
    //     "Author": "zoujiahe",
    //     "Date": "Do not edit",
    //     "Github": "https://github.com/xccjh",
    //     "Gitee": "https://gitee.com/xccjh",
    //     "Blog": "http://xccjh.gitee.io/mrzou-blogger",
    //     "LastEditors": "zoujiahe", // 文件最后编辑者
    //     "LastEditTime": "Do not edit",
    // },
    // "fileheader.configObj": {
    //     "moveCursor": true, // 移动光标到`Description :`所在行
    //     "createFileTime": false, // 设为false更改为当前生成注释的时间
    //     "autoAdd": false, // 自动添加头部注释开启才能自动添加
    //     "autoAlready": false, // 默认开启
    // },
    // "fileheader.cursorMode": {
    //     "description": "",
    //     "LastEditors": "zoujiahe", // 文件最后编辑者
    //     "Date": "Do not edit",
    //     "params": "",
    //     "return": ""
    // },
    // 配置函数注注释风格
    // "docthis.authorName": "zoujiahe",
    // "docthis.includeAuthorTag": true,
    // "docthis.includeDescriptionTag": true,
    // "docthis.includeDateTag": true,
    // "docthis.inferTypesFromNames": true,
    // 配置各个语言格式化工具
    "[html]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.html-language-features"
    },
    "[javascript]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.typescript-language-features"
    },
    "[json]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.json-language-features"
    },
    "[css]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "michelemelluso.code-beautifier"
    },
    "[less]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "michelemelluso.code-beautifier"
    },
    "[scss]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "michelemelluso.code-beautifier"
    },
    "[sass]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "syler.sass-indented" //配合sass语法高亮和格式化
    },
    "[javascriptreact]": {},
    "files.associations": { // 配置文件关联，以便启用对应的智能提示，比如wxss使用css
        "*.vue": "vue",
        "*.wxss": "css"
    },
    "files.trimTrailingWhitespace": true, // 是否允许自定义的snippet片段提示,比如自定义的vue片段开启后就可以智能提示
    "files.autoSave": "off", //关闭自动保存
    "search.exclude": { // VScode 文件搜索区域配置
        "**/dist": true,
        "**/build": true,
        "**/elehukouben": true,
        "**/.git": true,
        "**/.gitignore": true,
        "**/.svn": true,
        "**/.DS_Store": true,
        "**/.idea": true,
        "**/.vscode": false,
        "**/yarn.lock": true,
        "**/tmp": true
    },
    "search.followSymlinks": false, //关闭rg.exe进程,不允许网页文件做软链接,防止占用内存爆满
    "todohighlight.isEnable": true, //todo插件高亮
    "window.zoomLevel": 0, //窗口默认缩放级别，+1大20%
    "debug.toolBarLocation": "docked", //固定debug工具条
    "workbench.startupEditor": "newUntitledFile", //关闭欢迎页
    "workbench.editor.enablePreview": true, //打开文件覆盖
    "explorer.confirmDelete": false, //浏览文件树删除确定
    "styledComponentsExtractor.addImportStatement": true, //styledComponent自动导入
    "javascript.format.insertSpaceBeforeFunctionParenthesis": true, //js函数名前一个空格
    "typescript.format.insertSpaceBeforeFunctionParenthesis": true, //ts函数名前一个空格
    "javascript.implicitProjectConfig.experimentalDecorators": true, //去除对修饰器的实验支持是一项将在将来版本中更改的功能的提示
    "terminal.integrated.rendererType": "dom", //编辑器渲染使用dom,用来配置自定义毛玻璃效果以及霓虹主题等
    "terminal.integrated.shell.windows": "C:\\Program Files\\Git\\bin\\bash.exe", //默认终端
    "vsicons.dontShowNewVersionMessage": true, //显示版本更新提示
    // 配置vetur
    "vetur.format.options.tabSize": 4, //格式化vue配置缩进4空格
    "vetur.format.options.useTabs": false, //格式化vue使用空格
    "vetur.format.defaultFormatterOptions": {
        "prettier": {
            "semi": false, //去除结尾逗号
            "singleQuote": true //使用单引号
        }
    },
    "vetur.format.defaultFormatter.js": "vscode-typescript", //处理Missing space before function parentheses（函数前有一个空格）
    // 配置emmet语法
    "emmet.triggerExpansionOnTab": true, // emmet插件tab出来配置
    "emmet.includeLanguages": {
        "vue-html": "html", //开启vue支持
        "vue": "html",
        "javascript": "javascriptreact" //开启react的js支持
    },
    "emmet.syntaxProfiles": {
        "javascript": "jsx",
        "vue": "html",
        "vue-html": "html"
    },
    "breadcrumbs.enabled": true, //开启文件路径面包屑
    "diffEditor.ignoreTrimWhitespace": true, //对比文件差异忽略空格
    "vue-helper.rem-px": 100, // 默认rem转换比
    "html.format.wrapAttributes": "force-aligned", //html属性强制折行对齐
    "editor.lineNumbers": "on", //开启行数显示
    "editor.tabSize": 4, // 重新设定tabsize
    "editor.detectIndentation": false, //控制根据打开文件自动设置tabsize和转换空格设置
    "editor.insertSpaces": true, //tab键输出空格
    "editor.wordWrap": "on", //默认超出换行
    "editor.mouseWheelZoom": true, //开起滚轮缩放
    "editor.suggestSelection": "first", //
    "editor.quickSuggestions": { //开启自动显示建议
        "other": true,
        "comments": true,
        "strings": true
    },
    "editor.renderWhitespace": "all", //控制显示空格
    "editor.minimap.enabled": true, //显示右侧的预览面板
    "editor.renderControlCharacters": true, //显示控制字符
    "editor.formatOnSave": false, //保存时不自动格式化
    "eslint.enable": false, // 是否开启eslint检测
    "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {  //新版eslint配置保存按照eslint规则格式化
        "source.fixAll.eslint": false
    },
    "eslint.options": { //eslint检测的文件范围
        "extensions": [
            ".js",
            ".vue",
            "html"
        ],
    },
    "eslint.validate": [
        "javascript",
        "javascriptreact",
        "html",
        "vue",
        "typescript",
        "typescriptreact",
    ],
    "extensions.ignoreRecommendations": false,//开启扩展建议通知
    "git.confirmSync": false,// 同步 Git 存储库前请先进行确认
    "git.autorefresh": false,//自动prume
    "git.enableSmartCommit": true,//开启git am
    "gitlens.views.search.files.layout": "list",//指定“搜索提交”视图将如何显示文件
    "gitlens.hovers.currentLine.over": "line",//指定何时触发当前行的悬停
    "gitlens.views.repositories.files.layout": "tree",//gitlens仓库视图显示方式
}

                                                                      # vscode片段之css

                                                                      {
	"o": {
		"prefix": "o",
		"body": [
			"html,",
			"body,",
			"blockquote,",
			"textarea,",
			"th,",
			"pre,",
			"ul,",
			"li,",
			"ol,",
			"dl,",
			"dd,",
			"dt,",
			"p,",
			"h1,",
			"h2,",
			"h3,",
			"h4,",
			"h5,",
			"h6,",
			"a,",
			"span,",
			"div,",
			"input,",
			"form,",
			"fieldset,",
			"legend,",
			"img {",
			"    margin: 0;",
			"    padding: 0;",
			"    /*设置盒模型*/",
			"    box-sizing: border-box;",
			"    /*去除移动端特有的点击高亮效果*/",
			"    -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;",
			"}",
			"ul,",
			"ol {",
			"    list-style:none;",
			"}",
			"textarea {",
			"    resize: none;",
			"}",
			"fieldset,",
			"img,",
			"input,",
			"button {",
			"    border: none;",
			"    padding: 0;",
			"    margin: 0;",
			"    outline-style: none;",
			"    /*外面环绕线*/",
			"}",
			"img {",
			"    border: 0;  /*ie6*/",
			"    vertical-align: middle;",
			"}",
			"table {",
			"    border-collapse: collapse;",
			"    border-spacing: 0",
			"}",
			"button {",
			"    cursor: pointer;",
			"}",
			"select,",
			"input {",
			"    vertical-align: middle;",
			"}",
			".clearfix:after {",
			"    content: \"\";",
			"    display: block;",
			"    clear: both;",
			"    visibility: hidden;",
			"    height: 0;",
			"    line-height: 0;",
			"}",
			".clearfix {",
			"    *zoom: 1;",
			"}",
			"s,",
			"i,",
			"em {",
			"    /*一般是起装饰作用*/",
			"    font-style: normal;",
			"    /*去掉原有的样式*/",
			"    text-decoration: none;",
			"    /*去掉下划线或是删除线*/",
			"}",
			".fl {",
			"    float: left;",
			"}",
			".fr {",
			"    float: right;",
			"}",
			".al {",
			"    text-align: left;",
			"}",
			".ac {",
			"    text-align: center;",
			"}",
			".ar {",
			"    text-align: right;",
			"}",
			".none,",
			".hide {",
			"    display: none;",
			"}",
			".pr {",
			"    position: relative;",
			"}",
			".pa{",
			"    position: absolute;",
			"}",
			".ml10{",
			"    margin-left: 10px;",
			"}",
			".mr10{",
			"    margin-right: 10px;",
			"}",
			".mt10{",
			"    margin-top: 10px;",
			"}",
			"/*公共类*/",
			"body{",
			"    font-family: \"微软雅黑\",sans-serif;",
			"    font-size: 13px;",
			"}",
			"a,",
			"a:hover{",
			"    color: #666;",
			"    text-decoration: none;",
			"}",
			".w {",
			"    /*版心 提取 (改）*/",
			"    width: 640px;",
			"    margin: 0 auto;",
			"}",
			"/*页面主色调 */",
			".basecol {",
			"    color: #c81623 !important;/* （改）*/",
			"}",
			"/*定义字体图标样式*/",
			"@font-face {",
			"  font-family: 'iconfont';",
			"  src: url('../fonts/iconfont.eot');",
			"  src: url('../fonts/iconfont.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'),",
			"  url('../fonts/iconfont.woff') format('woff'),",
			"  url('../fonts/iconfont.ttf') format('truetype'),",
			"  url('../fonts/iconfont.svg#iconfont') format('svg');",
			"}",
			"/*调用定义的字体图标样式*/",
			".iconfont {",
			"    font-family: 'iconfont';",
			"    font-style: normal;",
			"}",

		],
		"description": "o"
	},
	"other": {
		"prefix": "other",
		"body": [
			"body,",
			"button,",
			"input,",
			"select,",
			"textarea {",
			"  font: 12px/1.5 microsoft yahei, Helvetica, Arial,,sans-serif",
			"}",
			"h1,",
			"h2,",
			"h3,",
			"h4,",
			"h5,",
			"h6,",
			"button,",
			"input,",
			"select,",
			"textarea {",
			"  font-size: 100%",
			"}",
			"address,",
			"cite,",
			"dfn,",
			"em,",
			"var {",
			"  font-style: normal",
			"}",
			"code,",
			"kbd,",
			"pre,",
			"samp {",
			"  font-family: PingFangSC-Regular, 'Microsoft YaHei',,Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif",
			"}",
			"small {",
			"  font-size: 12px",
			"}",
			"sup {",
			"  vertical-align: text-top",
			"}",
			"sub {",
			"  vertical-align: text-bottom",
			"}",
			"legend {",
			"  color: #000",
			"}"
		],
		"description": "other"
	},
	"mo": {
		"prefix": "mo",
		"body": [
			"* {",
			"    margin: 0;",
			"    padding: 0;",
			"    box-sizing: border-box;",
			"    -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);",
			"}",
			"ul {",
			"    list-style:none;",
			"}",
		],
		"description": "mo"
	},
	"po": {
		"prefix": "po",
		"body": [
			"* {",
			"    margin: 0;",
			"    padding: 0;",
			"    box-sizing: border-box;",
			"}",
			"ul {",
			"    list-style:none;",
			"}",
		],
		"description": "po"
	},
	"去除链接按钮高亮": {
		"prefix": "aaa",
		"body": [
			"a {",
			"    text-decoration: none;",
			"    -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);",
			"}",
		],
		"description": "去除链接按钮高亮"
	},
	"让按钮圆角可控": {
		"prefix": "r",
		"body": [
			"-webkit-appearance: none;",
		],
		"description": "让按钮圆角可控"
	},
	"loadding": {
		"prefix": "lo",
		"body": [
			".loadding::before {",
			"    position: fixed;",
			"    top: 0;",
			"    left: 0;",
			"    width: 100%;",
			"    height: 100%;",
			"    background-color: #fff;",
			"    opacity: .5;",
			"    content: \"\";",
			"    z-index: 100;",
			"  }",
			".loadding::after {",
			"    font: normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;",
			"    position: fixed;",
			"    top: 40%;",
			"    left: 50%;",
			"    margin-left: -50px;",
			"    font-size: 100px;",
			"    color: #0094ff;",
			"    content: \"\\f013\";",
			"    z-index: 101;",
			"    animation: fa-spin 1s infinite linear;",
			"  }",
		],
		"description": "loadding"
	},
	"多行...": {
		"prefix": "m...",
		"body": [
			"    display: -webkit-box;",
			"    overflow: hidden;",
			"    white-space: normal!important;",
			"    text-overflow: ellipsis;",
			"    word-wrap: break-word;",
			"    -webkit-line-clamp: 2;",
			"    -webkit-box-orient: vertical",
		],
		"description": "多行 ..."
	},
	"单行...": {
		"prefix": "s...",
		"body": [
			".ellipsis {",
			"    display: block;",
			"    white-space: nowrap;",
			"    overflow: hidden;",
			"    text-overflow: ellipsis;",
			"}"
		],
		"description": "单行..."
	},
	"媒体查询": {
		"prefix": "me",
		"body": [
			"@media only screen and (width: device-width) {",
			"    #test {",
			"        width: 200 px;",
			"    }",
			"}"
		],
		"description": "媒体查询"
	},
	"全屏": {
		"prefix": "hb",
		"body": [
			"html,body {",
			"    height:100%;",
			"    overflow:hidden;",
			"}"
		],
		"description": "全屏"
	},
	"居中": {
		"prefix": "center",
		"body": [
			"position: absolute;",
			"top: 50%;",
			"left: 50%;",
			"-webkit-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);",
			"-moz-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);",
			"-ms-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);",
			"-o-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);",
			"transform: translate(-50%, -50%);",
		],
		"description": "居中"
	},
	"clearfix0": {
		"prefix": "clearfix0",
		"body": [
			".clearfix:after {" ,
			"    content: \"\";" ,
			"    display: block;" ,
			"    clear: both;" ,
			"    visibility: hidden;" ,
			"    height: 0;" ,
			"    line-height: 0;" ,
			"}" ,
			"" ,
			".clearfix {" ,
			"    *zoom: 1;" ,
			"}"
		],
		"description": "clearfix0"
	},
	"clearfix1": {
		"prefix": "clearfix1",
		"body": [
			".clearfix:after{" ,
			"    content:\"\";" ,
			"    display:table;" ,
			"    clear:both;" ,
			"}",
			".clearfix {" ,
			"    *zoom: 1;" ,
			"}"
		],
		"description": "clearfix1"
	},
	"等腰三角形上": {
		"prefix": "arrowu",
		"body": [
			"width: 0;" ,
			"height: 0;" ,
			"border-left: 30px solid transparent;" ,
			"border-right: 30px solid transparent;" ,
			"border-bottom: 30px solid #000" ,
		],
		"description": "三角形上"
	},
	"等腰三角形下": {
		"prefix": "arrowd",
		"body": [
			"width: 0;" ,
			"height: 0;" ,
			"border-left: 30px solid transparent;" ,
			"border-right: 30px solid transparent;" ,
			"border-top: 30px solid #000" ,
		],
		"description": "三角形下"
	},
	"等腰三角形左": {
		"prefix": "arrowl",

			"width: 0;" ,
			"height: 0;" ,
			"border-top: 30px solid transparent;" ,
			"border-bottom: 30px solid transparent;" ,
			"border-right: 30px solid #000" ,
		],
		"description": "三角形左"
	},
	"等腰三角形右": {
		"prefix": "arrowr",
		"body": [
			"width: 0;",
			"height: 0;",
			"border-top: 30px solid transparent;",
			"border-bottom: 30px solid transparent;",
			"border-left: 30px solid #000",
		],

	},

			"height: 0;" ,

			"border-color: #ff3300 #ff3300 transparent transparent;"
		],

                                                                      # vscode片段之html

                                                                      {
	"console.log": {
		"prefix": "log",
		"body": [
			"console.log('$1');",
			"$2"
		],
		"description": "console.log"
	},
	"页面开启摄像头": {
		"prefix": "camera",
		"body": [
			"<!DOCTYPE html>",
			"<html lang=\"en\">",
			"<head>",
			"  <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">",
			"  <meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0\">",
			"  <meta http-equiv=\"X-UA-Compatible\" content=\"ie=edge\">",
			"  <title>Document</title>",
			"</head>",
			"<body>",
			"  <video src=\"\" width=\"600\" height=\"600\" autoplay controls></video>",
			"  <script>",
			"    var video = document.querySelector(\"video\");",
			"    navigator.getUserMedia({",
			"      video: true",
			"    }, success, error);",
			"    function success(stream) {",
			"      video.src = window.URL.createObjectURL(stream);",
			"    }",
			"    function error(err) {",
			"      console.log(err);",
			"    }",
			"  </script>",
			"</body> ",
			"</html>"

		],
		"description": "扩展zepto工具方法"
	},
	"删除空行": {
		"prefix": "ss",
		"body": [
			"^b*$\\n",
		],
		"description": "删除空行"
	},
	"删除单行注释": {
		"prefix": "zs",
		"body": [
			"^[ \\t]*//[^\\n]*\\n",
		],
		"description": "删除单行注释"
	},
	"a标签": {
		"prefix": "aa",
		"body": [
			"<a href=\"javascript:;\">$1</a>"
		],
		"description": "我自己定义的a标签"
	},
	"phone": {
		"prefix": "p",
		"body": [
			"<a href=\"tel:15018707394\">15018707394</a>"

		],

			"$TM_FILEPATH",
		],
		"description": "fp"
	},
	"轮播图": {

			"<div class=\"carousel-wrap\">",
			"    <div class=\"points-wrap\">",
			"</div></div>",
		],
		"description": "style*"
	},
	"vp": {

			"<meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0,maximum-scale=1,minimum-scale=1,user-scalable=no\">"
		],

	},
	"禁止移动端电话邮箱": {

		],

	},

	"vp适配": {

			"<script type = \"text/javascript\" >",
			"    (function () {",
			"    var targetWidth = 640;",
			"    var scale = document.documentElement.clientWidth / targetWidth;",
			"    var meta = document.querySelector(\"meta[name=viewport]\");",
			"    meta.content = \"initial-scale=\" + scale + \", user-scalable=no, maximun-scale=1.0, minimun-scale=1.0;\"",
			"    })() ",
			"    $1",
			"</script>",
		],
		"description": "vp适配"
	},
	"多了一个div": {
		"prefix": "hd",
		"body": [
			"<!DOCTYPE html>",
			"<html lang=\"en\">",
			"<head>",
			"  <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">",
			"  <meta http-equiv = \"X-UA-Compatible\" content =\"IE=edge\">",
			"  <title>$TM_FILENAME</title>",
			"  <style type=\"text/css\">",
			"      div:nth-child(1) {",
			"          width: 200px;",
			"          height: 200px;",
			"          background-color:aqua;",
			"          margin: 100px auto;",
			"      }",
			"  </style>",
			"</head> ",
			"<body>",
			"    <div></div>",
			"    <script type=\"text\/javascript \">",
			"       var div=document.querySelector(\"div\");",
			"    </script>",
			"</body>",
			"</html>"
		],
		"description": "多了一个div"
	},
	"1px": {
		"prefix": "1px",
		"body": [
			"<!DOCTYPE html>",
			"<html lang=\"en\">",
			"<head>",
			"  <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">",
			"  <meta http-equiv = \"X-UA-Compatible\" content =\"IE=edge\">",
			"  <title>$TM_FILENAME</title>",
			"  <meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0,maximum-scale=1,minimum-scale=1,user-scalable=no\">",
			"  <meta name=\"format-detection\" content=\"telephone=no,email=no\"/>",
			"  <style type=\"text/css\">",
			"       * {",
			"           margin: 0;",
			"           padding: 0;",
			"       }",
			"       ul {",
			"           list-style:none;",
			"       }",
			"       #test {",
			"          width: 16rem;",
			"          height: 1px;",
			"          background-color: black;",
			"          margin-top: 30px;;",
			"      }",
			"  </style>",
			"</head> ",
			"<body>",
			"    <div id=\"test\"></div>",
			"    <script type=\"text\/javascript \">",
			"        window.onload=function () {",
			"            var dpr=window.devicePixelRatio||1;",
			"            var styleNode = document.createElement('style');",
			"            var w = document.documentElement.clientWidth * dpr / 16;",
			"            styleNode.innerHTML = \"html {font-size:\" + w + \"px!important;}\";",
			"            document.head.appendChild(styleNode);",
			"            var scale=1/dpr;",
			"            var meta=document.querySelector('meta[name=\"viewport\"]');",
			"            meta.content=\"width=device-width,initial-scale=\"+scale;",
			"        }",
			"    </script>",
			"</body>",
			"</html>"
		],
		"description": "1px"
	},
	"1pxt": {
		"prefix": "1px",
		"body": [
			"<!DOCTYPE html>",
			"<html lang=\"en\">",
			"<head>",
			"  <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">",
			"  <meta http-equiv = \"X-UA-Compatible\" content =\"IE=edge\">",
			"  <title>$TM_FILENAME</title>",
			"  <meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0,maximum-scale=1,minimum-scale=1,user-scalable=no\">",
			"  <meta name=\"format-detection\" content=\"telephone=no,email=no\"/>",
			"  <style type=\"text/css\">",
			"       * {",
			"           margin: 0;",
			"           padding: 0;",
			"       }",
			"       #test {",
			"          width: 100%;",
			"          height: 1px;",
			"          background-color: black;",
			"          margin-top: 30px;",
			"      }",
			"      @media only screen and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio: 2) {",
			"          #test {",
			"              transform:scaleY(.5);",
			"          }",
			"      }",
			"      @media only screen and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio) {",
			"          #test {",
			"              transform:scaleY(.33333);",
			"          }",
			"      }",
			"  </style>",
			"</head> ",
			"<body>",
			"    <div id=\"test\"></div>",
			"</body>",
			"</html>"
		],
		"description": "1pxt"
	},
	"hm": {
		"prefix": "hm",
		"body": [
			"<!DOCTYPE html>",
			"<html lang=\"en\">",
			"<head>",
			"  <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">",
			"  <meta http-equiv = \"X-UA-Compatible\" content =\"IE=edge\">",
			"  <title>$TM_FILENAME</title>",
			"  <meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0,maximum-scale=1,minimum-scale=1,user-scalable=no\">",
			"  <meta name=\"format-detection\" content=\"telephone=no,email=no\"/>",
			"  <style type=\"text/css\">",
			"       * {",
			"           margin: 0;",
			"           padding: 0;",
			"       }",
			"       ul {",
			"           list-style:none;",
			"       }",
			"       a {",
			"           text-decoration: none;",
			"           -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);",
			"       }",
			"       input {",
			"          -webkit-appearance: none;",
			"      }",
			"  </style>",
			"</head> ",
			"<body>",
			"    <script type=\"text\/javascript \">",
			"        window.onload=function () {",
			"            document.addEventListener('touchstart', function (ev) {",
			"                ev = ev || event;",
			"                ev.preventDefault();",
			"            })",
			"            var dpr=window.devicePixelRatio||1;",
			"            var styleNode = document.createElement('style');",
			"            var w = document.documentElement.clientWidth * dpr / 16;",
			"            styleNode.innerHTML = \"html {font-size:\" + w + \"px!important;}\";",
			"            document.head.appendChild(styleNode);",
			"            var scale=1/dpr;",
			"            var meta=document.querySelector('meta[name=\"viewport\"]');",
			"            meta.content=\"width=device-width,initial-scale=\"+scale;",
			"            var aNodes = document.querySelectorAll(\"a\");",
			"            for (var i = 0; i < aNodes.length; i++) {",
			"                aNodes[i].addEventListener('touchstart', function (ev) {",
			"                    this.isMoved = false;",
			"                })",
			"                aNodes[i].addEventListener('touchmove', function () {",
			"                    this.isMoved = true;",
			"                })",
			"                aNodes[i].addEventListener('touchend', function () {",
			"                    if (!this.isMoved) {",
			"                        location.href = this.href;",
			"                    }",
			"                })",
			"            }",
			"            }",
			"    </script>",
			"</body>",
			"</html>"
		],
		"description": "hm"
	},
	"移动端开发模板": {
		"prefix": "hk",
		"body": [
			"<!DOCTYPE html>",
			"<html lang=\"en\">",
			"<head>",
			"  <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">",
			"  <meta http-equiv = \"X-UA-Compatible\" content =\"IE=edge\">",
			"  <title>$TM_FILENAME</title>",
			"  <meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0,maximum-scale=1,minimum-scale=1,user-scalable=no\">",
			"  <meta name=\"format-detection\" content=\"telephone=no,email=no\"/>",
			"  <style type=\"text/css\">",
			"       * {",
			"           margin: 0;",
			"           padding: 0;",
			"       }",
			"       ul {",
			"           list-style:none;",
			"       }",
			"       a {",
			"           text-decoration: none;",
			"           -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);",
			"       }",
			"       #test {",
			"          width: 16rem;",
			"          height: 1px;",
			"          background-color: black;",
			"          line-height: 200px;",
			"          text-align: center;",
			"          margin-top: 30px;;",
			"      }",
			"       #text {",
			"          width: 200px;",
			"          height: 200px;",
			"          background-color: yellow;",
			"          margin: 30px auto;",
			"      }",
			"       input {",
			"          width: 200px;",
			"          height: 200px;",
			"          -webkit-appearance: none;",
			"          border-radius:5px;",
			"      }",
			"  </style>",
			"</head> ",
			"<body>",
			"    <div id=\"test\"></div>",
			"    <div id = \"text\">",
			"        <a href = \"http://www.baidu.com\" id = \"aa\">百度</a>",
			"    </div>",
			"    <script type=\"text\/javascript \">",
			"        window.onload=function () {",
			"            //1.meta标签",
			"            //2.全面禁止移动事件默认行为（页面上所有的滚动条失效",
			"            //3.一个适配方案",
			"            //4.移动端a标签的跳转方案，解决误触",
			"            //5.解决链接按钮高亮问题",
			"            //6.去除电话邮箱的智能呼叫",
			"            //7.让按钮圆角可控",
			"            document.addEventListener('touchstart', function (ev) {",
			"                ev = ev || event;",
			"                ev.preventDefault();",
			"            })",
			"            var dpr=window.devicePixelRatio||1;",
			"            var styleNode = document.createElement('style');",
			"            var w = document.documentElement.clientWidth * dpr / 16;",
			"            styleNode.innerHTML = \"html {font-size:\" + w + \"px!important;}\";",
			"            document.head.appendChild(styleNode);",
			"            var scale=1/dpr;",
			"            var meta=document.querySelector('meta[name=\"viewport\"]');",
			"            meta.content=\"width=device-width,initial-scale=\"+scale;",
			"            var aNodes = document.querySelectorAll(\"a\");",
			"            for (var i = 0; i < aNodes.length; i++) {",
			"                aNodes[i].addEventListener('touchstart', function (ev) {",
			"                    this.isMoved = false;",
			"                })",
			"                aNodes[i].addEventListener('touchmove', function () {",
			"                    this.isMoved = true;",
			"                })",
			"                aNodes[i].addEventListener('touchend', function () {",
			"                    if (!this.isMoved) {",
			"                        location.href = this.href;",
			"                    }",
			"                })",
			"            }",
			"            $1",
			"            }",
			"    </script>",
			"</body>",
			"</html>"
		],
		"description": "移动端开发模板"
	},
	"html简单": {
		"prefix": "h",
		"body": [
			"<!DOCTYPE html>",
			"<html lang=\"en\">",
			"<head>",
			"  <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">",
			"  <meta http-equiv = \"X-UA-Compatible\" content =\"IE=edge\">",
			"  <title>$TM_FILENAME</title>",
			"  <style type=\"text/css\">",
			"  </style>",
			"</head> ",
			"<body>",
			"</body>",
			"    <script type=\"text\/javascript\">",
			"    </script>",
			"</html>",
		],
		"description": "html简单"
	},
	"hp": {
		"prefix": "hp",
		"body": [
			"<!DOCTYPE html>",
			"<html lang=\"en\">",
			"<head>",
			"  <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">",
			"  <meta http-equiv = \"X-UA-Compatible\" content =\"IE=edge\">",
			"  <title>$TM_FILENAME</title>",
			"  <meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0,maximum-scale=1,minimum-scale=1,user-scalable=no\">",
			"  <meta name=\"format-detection\" content=\"telephone=no,email=no\"/>",
			"  <style type=\"text/css\">",
			"  </style>",
			"</head> ",
			"<body>",
			"</body>",
			"    <script type=\"text\/javascript\">",
			"    </script>",
			"</html>"
		],
		"description": "hp"
	},
	"li标签嵌套a标签嵌套图片标签": {
		"prefix": "liai",
		"body": [
			"<li>",
			"    <a href=\"javascript:;\">",
			"        <img src = \"$1\" alt = \"\" >",
			"    </a>",
			"</li>"
		],
		"description": "li>a>img"
	},
	"生成jq标签": {
		"prefix": "jq",
		"body": [
			"<script src=\"https://cdn.staticfile.org/jquery/1.2.3/jquery.js\" type=\"text\/javascript \">",
			"</script>"
		],
		"description": ""
	},
	"生成js标签": {
		"prefix": "sc",
		"body": [
			"<script type=\"text\/javascript \">",
			"</script>"
		],
		"description": ""
	},
	"js入口": {
		"prefix": "w",
		"body": [
			"<script type = \"text/javascript\" >",
			"    window.onload=function () {",
			"    }",
			"</script>",
		],
		"description": "js入口"
	},
	"佛祖": {
		"prefix": "fz",
		"body": [
			"<pre style='transform:translateX(-50%);position:absolute;left:50%;>'",
			"                   _ooOoo_",
			"                  o8888888o",
			"                  88\" . \"88",
			"                  (| -_- |)",
			"                  O\\  =  /O",
			"               ____/`---'\\____",
			"             .'  \\|     |//  `.",
			"            /  \\|||  :  |||//  \\",
			"           /  _||||| -:- |||||-  \\",
			"           |   | \\\\\\  -  /// |   |",
			"           | \\_|  ''\\---/''  |   |",
			"           \\  .-\\__  `-`  ___/-. /",
			"         ___`. .'  /--.--\\ `. . __",
			"      .\"\" '<  `.___\\_<|>_/___.'  >'\"\".",
			"     | | :  `- \\`.;`\\ _ /`;.`/ - ` : | |",
			"     \\  \\ `-.   \\_ __\\ /__ _/   .-` /  /",
			"======`-.____`-.___\\_____/___.-`____.-'======",
			"                   `=---='",
			"^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^",
			"            佛祖保佑       永无BUG",
			"     佛曰:  ",
			"          写字楼里写字间，写字间里程序员；",
			"          程序人员写程序，又拿程序换酒钱。",
			"          酒醒只在网上坐，酒醉还来网下眠；",
			"          酒醉酒醒日复日，网上网下年复年。",
			"          但愿老死电脑间，不愿鞠躬老板前；",
			"          奔驰宝马贵者趣，公交自行程序员。",
			"          别人笑我忒疯癫，我笑自己命太贱；",
			"          不见满街漂亮妹，哪个归得程序员？",
			" </pre>"
		],
		"description": "佛祖"
	}

                                                                      # vscode片段之js

                                                                      {
	"zrcc" :{
		"prefix" :"zrcc",
		"body" :[
			"import React, { Component } from 'react';",
			"import { connect } from 'react-redux';",
			"",
			"",
			"class index extends Component {",
			"	render() {",
			"		return (",
			"			<div>",
			"				",
			"			</div>",
			"		);",
			"	}",
			"}",
			"",
			"const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({",
			"	",
			"})",
			"const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({",
			"	",
			"})",
			"",
			"export default connect(",
			"	mapStateToProps,",
			"	mapDispatchToProps",
			")(index);",
		]
	},
	"App" :{
		"prefix" :"App",
		"body" :[
			"import React, { Component } from 'react';",
			"import { GlobalStyle } from './style';",
			"import { GlobalStyledIconfont } from './statics/iconfont/iconfont';",
			"import { Provider } from 'react-redux';",
			"import { BrowserRouter,Route } from 'react-router-dom';",
			"import Header from './common/header';",
			"import Home from './pages/home';",
			"import store from './store';",
			"class App extends Component {",
			"render() {",
			"	return (",
			"	<Provider store={store}>",
			"		<BrowserRouter>",
			"		<div>",
			"			<GlobalStyle />",
			"			<GlobalStyledIconfont/>",
			"			<Header />",
			"			<Route path='/' exact component={Home}></Route>",
			"		</div>",
			"		</BrowserRouter>",
			"	</Provider>",
			"	);",
			"}",
			"}",
			"export default App;"
		]
	},
	"iconfonts" :{
		"prefix" :"iconfonts",
		"body" :[
			"import { createGlobalStyle } from 'styled-components';",
			"export const GlobalStyledIconfont = createGlobalStyle`",
			"@font-face {",
			"	font-family: 'iconfont';",
			"	src: url('./iconfont.eot?t=1528610804703'); /* IE9*/",
			"	src: url('./iconfont.eot?t=1528610804703#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'), /* IE6-IE8 */",
			"	url('data:application/x-font-woff;charset=utf-8;base64,d09GRgABAAAAAAawAAsAAAAACXQAAQAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAABHU1VCAAABCAAAADMAAABCsP6z7U9TLzIAAAE8AAAARAAAAFZW7ko/Y21hcAAAAYAAAAB+AAABwJ8cCDpnbHlmAAACAAAAApEAAAL0URYALWhlYWQAAASUAAAALwAAADYRpQXlaGhlYQAABMQAAAAcAAAAJAfeA4dobXR4AAAE4AAAABMAAAAYF+kAAGxvY2EAAAT0AAAADgAAAA4C3AHkbWF4cAAABQQAAAAfAAAAIAEVAF1uYW1lAAAFJAAAAUUAAAJtPlT+fXBvc3QAAAZsAAAAQgAAAFNcaMVWeJxjYGRgYOBikGPQYWB0cfMJYeBgYGGAAJAMY05meiJQDMoDyrGAaQ4gZoOIAgCKIwNPAHicY2Bk/sM4gYGVgYOpk+kMAwNDP4RmfM1gxMjBwMDEwMrMgBUEpLmmMDgwVLwIZG7438AQw9zA0AAUZgTJAQAq0wzDeJzFkTEKwzAMRZ9itxSTMblF5xygc5ZcpFMHn1jkFumXHQo9Qb54RvrIyFjADUjiKTLYByP0lmvNT5TmZ16qCw8GRfXZl307DnnVp1/eZeorjIrIk6Zk3cHuXCa7bvS/xnauZxX/X0/0RJ86sROfO9HjSyd2tG8dhi8XIxfqAAB4nDWSz2sTQRTH581kdtM02W33Z7L5nW12G1s3cbObiNpsChX8hRUEsQ0oCnqoKBYLvShEJBDFg2CPglAEr73UUy0ttP9ATz14sCiCx148tVs3aTszvOF934PPvPcGUYSO9sgaiSMRjaJzaArdQgiYMShwOA1507HwGMh5KqsSR0zdzLN6wSIToBYYSbFrjqEyLMMDBxmo5u2aaWETXKeBL4KtpAESSe22UEwJ5ANE4mam41/DyyBn9RTfOOtfHfckOyeGF6OCkBCE92GG0jDGIZ6Dp6oyQAcijP+F8pq8li3hLEQTpnZjJpZLCg+6zrN0UR0AaLdBTOa4r96wNhycl5oiCgl2KBaOazF9RILF34NxMZo2fqFg4aDWNgk2GkL5oEo2AzIHrMuqbgPqjlHuu5Ki1i3oKTI+mLUqZLXbbq8f0qmDvm0eS/j7rLUw2V0lzXa7SQ/XW8tvTu7maaDP2yQbZBLJPR6FBrgWmFwPrNq1OvQaGIj1wA1EC8g3f98oka2lpa1QaGvJm7eAj2jSwXJopdNZIaRnWeCt595xwsdtcsbw9yOSBv86K6HTrF6toYB9FLARYhGPRlAZoXx/elAViWHqDEtorWqnQXd1Ri8YruOBoxfY4CGypFTt2gTgjcdX/N3Lj4B/OPWEMpiyc7Bbabw4D/lJqz53r3mhfH80ndOKlZ0dgvwSeEOGLvqbNLWwXa5VSne46PXiXZpKyCm7mDnp/2syQ14hDhkIeQAeXALdNBiZB1AZHjPBDESjHugNrGSDP8X6n4EkXHgL2MX+n59R+Uc4ZYdxAkchSZ3BnDkqdIuKHJuHjfEW4GkAaIX8+Dsp8gmz6VQYoqoEfyMtIT7IRG6q0wH3P3/XmCcAAAB4nGNgZGBgAOKzF3Kd4/ltvjJwszCAwHWnB18Q9P8GFgbmBiCXg4EJJAoAVtsL6AB4nGNgZGBgbvjfwBDDwgACQJKRARWwAQBHDAJveJxjYWBgYH7JwMDCgIoBEp8BAQAAAAAAAHYArgDsATYBegAAeJxjYGRgYGBjCGRgZQABJiDmAkIGhv9gPgMAEUgBcwB4nGWPTU7DMBCFX/oHpBKqqGCH5AViASj9EatuWFRq911036ZOmyqJI8et1ANwHo7ACTgC3IA78EgnmzaWx9+8eWNPANzgBx6O3y33kT1cMjtyDRe4F65TfxBukF+Em2jjVbhF/U3YxzOmwm10YXmD17hi9oR3YQ8dfAjXcI1P4Tr1L+EG+Vu4iTv8 			"	url('./iconfont.svg?t=1528610804703#iconfont') format('svg'); /* iOS 4.1- */",
			"}",

			"	font-family:'iconfont' !important;",
			"	font-size:16px;",
			"	font-style:normal;",
			"	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;",
			"	-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;",
			"}",
			"`;",
		]

	"globals" :{
		"prefix" :"globals",
		"body" :[
			"import {createGlobalStyle} from 'styled-components';",
			"export const GlobalStyle = createGlobalStyle`",
			"	html, body, div, span, applet, object, iframe,",
			"	h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, blockquote, pre,",
			"	a, abbr, acronym, address, big, cite, code,",
			"	del, dfn, em, img, ins, kbd, q, s, samp,",
			"	small, strike, strong, sub, sup, tt, var,",
			"	b, u, i, center,",
			"	dl, dt, dd, ol, ul, li,",
			"	fieldset, form, label, legend,",
			"	table, caption, tbody, tfoot, thead, tr, th, td,",
			"	article, aside, canvas, details, embed, ",
			"	figure, figcaption, footer, header, hgroup, ",
			"	menu, nav, output, ruby, section, summary,",
			"	time, mark, audio, video {",
			"		margin: 0;",
			"		padding: 0;",
			"		border: 0;",
			"		font-size: 100%;",
			"		font: inherit;",
			"		vertical-align: baseline;",
			"	}",
			"	/* HTML5 display-role reset for older browsers */",
			"	article, aside, details, figcaption, figure, ",
			"	footer, header, hgroup, menu, nav, section {",
			"		display: block;",
			"	}",
			"	body {",
			"		line-height: 1;",
			"	}",
			"	ol, ul {",
			"		list-style: none;",
			"	}",
			"	blockquote, q {",
			"		quotes: none;",
			"	}",
			"	blockquote:before, blockquote:after,",
			"	q:before, q:after {",
			"		content: '';",
			"		content: none;",
			"	}",
			"	table {",
			"		border-collapse: collapse;",
			"		border-spacing: 0;",
			"	}",
			"`;",
		]
	},
	"zreducer" :{
		"prefix" :"zreducer",
		"body" :[
			"import { fromJS } from 'immutable';",
			"import * as constants from './constants';",
			"const defaultState = fromJS({",
			"topicList: [],",
			"articleList: [],",
			"recommendList: [],",
			"articlePage: 1,",
			"showScroll: false",
			"});",
			"export default (state = defaultState, action) => {",
			"switch (action.type) {",
			"	case constants.CHANGE_HOME_DATA:",
			"	return changeHomeData(state, action);",
			"	case constants.TOGGLE_SCROLL_TOP:",
			"	return state.set('showScroll', action.show);",
			"	case constants.ADD_ARTICLE_LIST:",
			"			return addArticleList(state, action);",
			"	default:",
			"	return state;",
			"}",
			"}",
		]
	},
	"comb" :{
		"prefix" :"comb",
		"body" :[
			"import { combineReducers } from 'redux-immutable';",
			"import { reducer as headerReducer } from '../common/header/store';",
			"// import { reducer as detailReducer } from '../pages/detail/store';",
			"import { reducer as homeReducer } from '../pages/home/store';",
			"// import { reducer as loginReducer } from '../pages/login/store';",
			"const reducer=combineReducers({",
			"	header:headerReducer,",
			"	// detail:detailReducer,",
			"	// login:loginReducer,",
			"	home:homeReducer",
			"})",
			"export default reducer",
		]
	},
	"cstore" :{
		"prefix" :"cstore",
		"body" :[
			"import {createStore,applyMiddleware,compose} from 'redux'",
			"import thunk from 'redux-thunk'",
			"import reducer from './reducer';",
			"const composeEnchancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;",
			"const store=createStore(reducer,composeEnchancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)))",
			"export default store",
		]
	},

			"import * as constants from './constants';",
			"export { reducer, actionCreators, constants };",

			"export const getHomeInfo = () => {",
			"	return (dispatch) => {",
			"		axios.get('/api/home.json').then((res) => {",
			"			const result = res.data.data;",
			"			dispatch(changHomeData(result));",
			"		});",
			"	}",

	"打印文本": {
		"prefix": "log",
		"body": [
			"console.log($1);"
		],
		"description": "打印输出"
	},
	"0": {
		"prefix": "0",
		"body": [
			"//#region $1",
			"$2",
			"//#endregion"
		],
		"description": "0"
	},
	"父级元素的第一个子级元素": {
		"prefix": "getFirstElementChild",
		"body": [
			"function getFirstElementChild(element) {",
			"\t\tif (element.firstElementChild) {",
			"\t\t\treturn element.firstElementChild;",
			"\t\t}else {",
			"\t\t\tvar node = element.firstChild;",
			"\t\t\twhile (node&&node.nodeType!=1) {",
			"\t\t\t\tnode=node.nextSibling;",
			"\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t\treturn node;",
			"\t\t}",
			"\t};"
		],
		"description": "父级元素的第一个子级元素"
	},
	"父级元素的最后一个子级元素": {
		"prefix": "getLastElementChild",
		"body": [
			"function getLastElementChild(element) {",
			"\t\tif (element.lastElementChild) {",
			"\t\t\treturn element.lastElementChild;",
			"\t\t}else {",
			"\t\t\tvar node = element.lastChild;",
			"\t\t\twhile (node&&node.nodeType!=1) {",
			"\t\t\t\tnode=node.previousSibling;",
			"\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t\treturn node;",
			"\t\t}",
			"\t};"
		],
		"description": "父级元素的最后一个子级元素"
	},
	"元素的前一个元素": {
		"prefix": "getPreviousElementSibling",
		"body": [
			"function getPreviousElementSibling(element) {",
			"\t\tif (element.previousElementSibling) {",
			"\t\t\treturn element.previousElementSibling;",
			"\t\t}else {",
			"\t\t\tvar node = element.previousSibling;",
			"\t\t\twhile (node&&node.nodeType!=1) {",
			"\t\t\t\tnode=node.previousSibling;",
			"\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t\treturn node;",
			"\t\t}",
			"\t};"
		],
		"description": "元素的前一个元素"
	},
	"元素的后一个元素": {
		"prefix": "getNextElementSibling",
		"body": [
			"function getNextElementSibling(element) {" +
			"\t\tif (element.nextElementSibling) {",
			"\t\t\treturn element.nextElementSibling;",
			"\t\t}else {",
			"\t\t\tvar node = element.nextSibling;",
			"\t\t\twhile (node&&node.nodeType!=1) {",
			"\t\t\t\tnode=node.nextSibling;",
			"\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t\treturn node;",
			"\t\t}",
			"\t};"
		],
		"description": "元素的后一个元素"
	},
	"兼容设置文本内容": {
		"prefix": "setInnerText",
		"body": [
			"function setInnerText(element,text) {",
			"\t\t\tif (typeof element.textContent == \"undefined\") {",
			"\t\t\t\telement.innerText=text;",
			"\t\t\t}else {",
			"\t\t\t\telement.textContent=text;",
			"\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t}"
		],
		"description": "兼容设置文本内容"
	},
	"兼容获取文本内容": {
		"prefix": "getInnerText",
		"body": [
			"function getInnerText(element) {",
			"\t\t\tif (typeof element.textContent== \"undefined\") {",
			"\t\t\t\treturn element.innerText;",
			"\t\t\t}else {",
			"\t\t\t\treturn element.textContent;",
			"\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t};"
		],
		"description": "兼容获取文本内容"
	},
	"获取元素计算后的属性值": {
		"prefix": "getStyle",
		"body": [
			"function getStyle(element,attr) {",
			"\t\t\treturn window.getComputedStyle?window.getComputedStyle(element,null)[attr] : element.currentStyle[attr];",
			"\t\t}"
		],
		"description": "获取元素计算后的属性值"
	},
	"兼容getElementsByClassName": {
		"prefix": "dgcj",
		"body": [
			"if (!document.getElementsByClassName) { //如果浏览器不支持document.getElementsByClassName",
			"  document.getElementsByClassName = function(className, element) { //我们先将要写的方法封装成一个函数",
			"    var children = (element || document).getElementsByTagName('*'); //获取html中所有的DOM节点 ",
			"    var elements = []; //用一个空数组存放要获取的class类名",
			"    for (var i = 0; i < children.length; i++) {",
			"      var child = children[i];",
			"      var classNames = child.className.split(' '); //将所有的class节点保存在一个数组之中",
			"      for (var j = 0; j < classNames.length; j++) { //遍历循环，将满足要求的class存入elements空数组中",
			"        if (classNames[j] == className) {",
			"          elements.push(child);",
			"          break;",
			"        }",
			"      }",
			"    }",
			"    return elements; //返回新的数组",
			"  };",
			"}"
		],
		"description": "兼容getElementsByClassName"
	},
	"zepto前置拦截器": {
		"prefix": "zb",
		"body": [
			"  $.ajaxSettings.beforeSend = function (xhr, obj) {",
			"    obj.url = baseUrl  + obj.url;",
			"  }"
		],
		"description": "zepto前置拦截器"
	},
	"zepto后置拦截器": {
		"prefix": "za",
		"body": [
			"  $.ajaxSettings.complete = function () {",
			"\t",
			"  }"
		],
		"description": "zepto后置拦截器"
	},
	"扩展zepto工具方法": {
		"prefix": "kz",
		"body": [
			"  $.extend($, {",
			"    show: function () {",
			"      $(\"body\").addClass(\"waitting\");",
			"    }",
			"  });"
		],
		"description": "扩展zepto工具方法"
	},
	"bootstrap 屏幕宽度种类": {
		"prefix": "bootstrap",
		"body": [
			"function whatScreen() {",
			"    var width = window.screen.width;",
			"    var title = document.querySelector(\"title\");",
			"    if (width <= 768) {",
			"        title.innerHTML = \"极小屏幕-\" + width;",
			"    } else if (width > 768 && width <= 992) {",
			"        title.innerHTML = \"小屏幕-\" + width;",
			"    } else if (width > 992 && width <= 1200) {",
			"        title.innerHTML = \"普通屏幕-\" + width;",
			"    } else if (width > 1200) {",
			"        title.innerHTML = \"大屏幕-\" + width;",
			"    }",
			"}",
		],
		"description": "bootstrap 屏幕宽度种类"
	},
	"自定义DOM事件": {
		"prefix": "zdye",
		"body": [
			"var evt = document.createEvent(\"HTMLEvents\");",
			"  // 初始化，事件类型，是否冒泡，是否阻止浏览器的默认行为",
			"  evt.initEvent(\"tap\", false, false);",
			"  // 触发",
			"  div.dispatchEvent(evt);"
		],
		"description": "自定义DOM事件"
	},
	"使用node删除typora中多余的图片": {
		"prefix": "delp",
		"body": [
			"// process.argv",
			"const path = require(\"path\");",
			"const fs = require(\"fs\");",
			"",
			"dImgs();",
			"/* ",
			"默认是当前路径的 meidas文件夹",
			"默认是当前路径的所有的md 文件",
			" */",
			"function dImgs() {",
			"  /* ",
			"  1 获取medias里面所有的图片 =>[]",
			"  2 将图片数组和md中的图片引用对比，发现循环后不存在的数组，再开始循环删除",
			"   */",
			"",
			"  let dirName = \"medias\";",
			"",
			"  //  图片文件名称数组 =  要删除的图片的数组",
			"  let imgArrNames = fs.readdirSync(dirName);",
			"  // console.log(imgArrNames22);",
			"  // 获取目录下的所有md文件名称",
			"  let mdNames = fs.readdirSync(\"./\").filter(v => {",
			"    return v.includes(\".md\")",
			"  });",
			"",
			"",
			"  console.log(\"源图片的长度：\" + imgArrNames.length);",
			"  mdNames.forEach(v => {",
			"    // v 是每一个md文件的名称  ",
			"    // 获取md文件字符串",
			"    let mdContent = fs.readFileSync(v).toString(\"utf8\");",
			"    // 循环里面不要修改源数组的长度",
			"    // 要保留的图片名数组",
			"    let saveImgs = [];",
			"    imgArrNames.forEach((vImg, iImg) => {",
			"      if (mdContent.includes(vImg)) {",
			"        // vImg 为不需要删除的文件",
			"        saveImgs.push(vImg);",
			"      }",
			"    });",
			"    saveImgs.forEach((v) => {",
			"      // 修改上一个要循环的图片",
			"      let deI = imgArrNames.indexOf(v);",
			"      if (deI != -1) {",
			"        imgArrNames.splice(deI, 1);",
			"      }",
			"    });",
			"",
			"  });",
			"",
			"  // 循环删除",
			"  let deIndex = 0;",
			"  imgArrNames.forEach(v => {",
			"    fs.unlinkSync(path.join(dirName, v));",
			"    console.log(\"删除的图片的名称\" + v);",
			"    deIndex++;",
			"  });",
			"  console.log(\"删除成功\" + deIndex);",
			"}"
		],
		"description": "使用node删除typora中多余的图片"
	},
	"兼容事件": {
		"prefix": "ev",
		"body": [
			"ev = ev || event;"
		],
		"description": "兼容事件"
	},
	"绑定事件兼容代码": {
		"prefix": "addEventListener",
		"body": [
			"function addEventListener(element,type,fn) {",
			"\t\t\tif(element.addEventListener) {",
			"\t\t\t\telement.addEventListener(type, fn, false);",
			"\t\t\t}else if (element.attachEvent) {",
			"\t\t\t\telement.attachEvent(\"on\"+type,fn);",
			"\t\t\t}else {",
			"\t\t\t\telement[\"on\"+type]=fn;",
			"\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t}"
		],
		"description": "绑定事件兼容代码"
	},
	"解绑事件兼容代码": {
		"prefix": "removeEventListener",
		"body": [
			"function removeEventListener(element,type,fn) {",
			"\t\t\tif(element.removeEventListener) {",
			"\t\t\t\telement.removeEventListener(type, fn, false)",
			"\t\t\t}else if (element.detachEvent) {",
			"\t\t\t\telement.detachEvent(\"on\"+type,fn);",
			"\t\t\t}else {",
			"\t\t\t\telement[\"on\"+type]=null;",
			"\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t}"
		],
		"description": "解绑事件兼容代码"
	},
	"兼容scroll": {
		"prefix": "getScroll",
		"body": [
			"function getScroll() {",
			"\t\t\treturn {",
			"\t\t\ttop:window.pageYOffset||document.documentElement.scrolltop|,document.body.scrolltop||0,",
			"\t\t\tleft:window.pageXOffset||document.documentElement.scrollleft|,document.body.scrollleft||0,",
			"\t\t\t};",
			"\t\t};"
		],
		"description": "兼容性滚动条"
	},
	"兼容pageX/Y": {
		"prefix": "getPage",
		"body": [
			"function getPage(evt){",
			"\treturn {",
			"\t\tpageX:this.getEvent(evt).pageX?this.getEvent(evt).pageX:this.getClintX(evt,+this.getScrollLeft(),",
			"\t\tpageY:this.getEvent(evt).pageY?this.getEvent(evt).pageY:this.getClintY(evt,+this.getScrollTop();",
			"\t}",
			"}"
		],
		"description": "兼容pageX"
	},
	"冒泡排序": {
		"prefix": "bubbleSort",
		"body": [
			"function bubbleSort(arr) {",
			"    var len = arr.length;",
			"    for (var i = 0; i < len - 1; i++) {",
			"        for (var j = 0; j < len - 1 - i; j++) {",
			"            if (arr[j] > arr[j + 1]) { // 相邻元素两两对比",
			"                var temp = arr[j + 1]; // 元素交换",
			"                arr[j + 1] = arr[j];",
			"                arr[j] = temp;",
			"            }",
			"        }",
			"    }",
			"    return arr;",
			"}"
		],
		"description": "冒泡排序"
	},
	"缓动动画": {
		"prefix": "animatea",
		"body": [
			" function animatea(element, obj, callback) {",
			"     clearInterval(element.timer);",
			"     element.timer = setInterval(function () {",
			"         var flag = true;",
			"         for (var attr in obj) {",
			"             if (attr === 'zIndex') {",
			"                 var target = obj[attr];",
			"                 element.style[attr] = target;",
			"             } else if (attr === 'opacity') {",
			"                 var current = 100 * parseFloat(window.getComputedStyle(element)[attr]);",
			"                 var target = 100 * obj[attr];",
			"                 var step = (target - current) / 10;",
			"                 step = step > 0 ? Math.ceil(step) : Math.floor(step);",
			"                 current += step;",
			"                 element.style[attr] = current / 100;",
			"             } else {",
			"                 var current = parseFloat(window.getComputedStyle(element)[attr]);",
			"                 var target = obj[attr];",
			"                 var step = (target - current) / 10;",
			"                 step = step > 0 ? Math.ceil(step) : Math.floor(step);",
			"                 current += step;",
			"                 element.style[attr] = current + 'px';",
			"             }",
			"             if (current !== target) {",
			"                 flag = false;",
			"             }",
			"         }",
			"         if (flag) {",
			"             clearInterval(element.timer);",
			"             if (typeof callback === 'function') {",
			"                 callback();",
			"             }",
			"         }",
			"     }, 24);",
			" }"
		],
		"description": "缓动动画"
	},
	"匀速动画height": {
		"prefix": "animateh",
		"body": [
			"function animateh(element, target, step) {",
			"    var current = element.offsetHeight;",
			"    step = step || 9;",
			"    clearInterval(element.timer);",
			"    element.timer = setInterval(function () {",
			"        if (current < target) {",
			"            current += step;",
			"        } else {",
			"            current -= step;",
			"        }",
			"        element.style.height = current + 'px';",
			"        if (Math.abs(target - current) <= step) {",
			"            clearInterval(element.timer);",
			"            element.style.height = target + 'px';",
			"        }",
			"    }, 24);",
			"}"
		],
		"description": "匀速动画height"
	},
	"匀速动画left": {
		"prefix": "animatel",
		"body": [
			"function animatel(element, target, step) {",
			"    var current = element.offsetLeft;",
			"    step = step || 9;",
			"    clearInterval(element.timer);",
			"    element.timer = setInterval(function () {",
			"        if (current < target) {",
			"            current += step;",
			"        } else {",
			"            current -= step;",
			"        }",
			"        element.style.left = current + 'px';",
			"        if (Math.abs(target - current) <= step) {",
			"            clearInterval(element.timer);",
			"            element.style.left = target + 'px';",
			"        }",
			"    }, 24);",
			"}"
		],
		"description": "匀速动画left"
	},
	"距离选择匀速速度height": {
		"prefix": "animatedh",
		"body": [
			"function animatedh(element, target) {",
			"    var currenta = parseInt(element.offsetHeight); //根据距离选择匀速的速度大小",
			"    clearInterval(element.timeId);",
			"    element.timeId = setInterval(function () {",
			"        var current = element.offsetHeight;",
			"        var step = Math.abs(target - currenta) / 50; //根据距离选择匀速的速度大小",
			"        strp = current < target ? step : -step;",
			"        current += strp;",
			"        if (Math.abs(target - current) < Math.abs(step)) {",
			"            clearInterval(element.timeId);",
			"            element.style.height = target + \"px\";",
			"        } else {",
			"            element.style.height = current + \"px\";",
			"        }",
			"    }, 10);",
			"};"
		],
		"description": "距离选择匀速速度height"
	},
	"距离选择匀速速度left": {
		"prefix": "animated",
		"body": [
			"function animatedl(element, target) {",
			"    var currenta = parseInt(element.offsetLeft);//根据距离选择匀速的速度大小",
			"    clearInterval(element.timeId);",
			"    element.timeId = setInterval(function () {",
			"        var current = element.offsetLeft;",
			"        var step = Math.abs(target - currenta) / 50; //根据距离选择匀速的速度大小",
			"        strp = current < target ? step : -step;",
			"        current += strp;",
			"        if (Math.abs(target - current) < Math.abs(step)) {",
			"            clearInterval(element.timeId);",
			"            element.style.left = target + \"px\";",
			"        } else {",
			"            element.style.left = current + \"px\";",
			"        }",
			"    }, 10);",
			"};"
		],
		"description": "距离选择匀速速度left"
	},

			"    //  hasOwnProperty   in",
			"    if (!obj.hasOwnProperty(pro) && (pro in obj)) {",
			"        return true;",
			"    }",
			"    return false;",
			"}",
		],
		"description": "判断有没有这属性"

			"}",
		],

			"    } else {",
			"        return true;",
			"    }",
			"}",
		],

			"function checkEmail(myemail) {　　",
			"    var myReg = /^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+@([a-zA-Z0-9]+\\.)+(com|cn|net|org)$/;",
			"    if (myReg.test(myemail)) {　　　　",
			"        return true;　　",
			"    } else {　　　　",
			"        return false;",
			"    }",
			"}",
		],
		"description": "验证邮箱"
	},
	"获取浏览器参数": {
		"prefix": "url",
		"body": [
			"function getUrl(name) {",
			"    var reg = new RegExp(\"(^|&)\" + name + \"=([^&]*)(&|$)\", i);",
			"    var r = window.location.search.substr(1).match(reg);",
			"    if (r != null) return decodeURI(r[2]);",
			"    return null;",
			"}",
		],
		"description": "获取浏览器参数"
	},

	"remd": {
		"prefix": "remd",
		"body": [
			"window.onload=function () {",
			"    var dpr=window.devicePixelRatio||1;",
			"    var styleNode = document.createElement('style');",
			"    var w = document.documentElement.clientWidth * dpr / 16;",
			"    styleNode.innerHTML = \"html {font-size:\"+ w+ \"px!important;}\";",
			"    document.head.appendChild(styleNode);",
			"    var scale=1/dpr;",
			"    var meta=document.querySelector('meta[name=\"viewport\"]');",
			"    meta.content=\"width=device-width,initial-scale=\"+scale;",
			"}",
		],
		"description": "remd"

	"移动端a跳转方案": {
		"prefix": "a",
		"body": [
			"var aNodes = document.querySelectorAll(\"a\");",
			"for (var i = 0; i < aNodes.length; i++) {",
			"    aNodes[i].addEventListener('touchstart', function (ev) {",
			"        this.isMoved = false;",
			"    })",
			"    aNodes[i].addEventListener('touchmove', function () {",
			"        this.isMoved = true;",
			"    })",
			"    aNodes[i].addEventListener('touchend', function () {",
			"        if (!this.isMoved) {",
			"            location.href = this.href;",
			"        }",
			"    })",
			"}",
		],
		"description": "移动端a跳转方案"
	},
	"轮播图": {
		"prefix": "l",
		"body": [
			"// 添加轮播图片的路径",
			"\t\tvar arr = [\"img/01.jpg\", \"img/02.jpg\", \"img/03.jpg\", \"img/04.jpg\", \"img/05.jpg\"]",
			"\t\tcarousel(arr);",
			"\t\tfunction carousel(arr) {",
			"\t\t\t//容器布局",
			"\t\t\tvar carouselWrap = document.querySelector(\".carousel-wrap\");",
			"\t\t\tif (carouselWrap) {",
			"\t\t\t\tvar ulNode = document.createElement(\"ul\");",
			"\t\t\t\tvar styleNode = document.createElement(\"style\");",
			"\t\t\t\tulNode.classList.add(\"list\");",
			"\t\t\t\tfor (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {",
			"\t\t\t\t\tulNode.innerHTML+= '<li><a href=\"javascript:;\"><img src=\"'+ arr[i]+ '\"/></a></li>';",
			"\t\t\t\t}",
			"styleNode.innerHTML = \".carousel-wrap > .list > li{width: \" + (1 / arr.length * 100) + \"%;};.carousel-wrap > .list{\" + \"width: \" + arr.length + \"00 %};\"",
			"\t\t\t\tcarouselWrap.appendChild(ulNode);",
			"\t\t\t\tdocument.head.appendChild(styleNode);",
			"",
			"\t\t\t\tvar imgNodes = document.querySelector(\".carousel-wrap > .list > li > a >img\");",
			"\t\t\t\t//定时器获取图片高度",
			"\t\t\t\t// setTimeout(function(){",
			"\t\t\t\t// \tcarouselWrap.style.height=imgNodes.offsetHeight+\"px\";",
			"\t\t\t\t// },100)",
			"\t\t\t\timgNodes.onload = function () {",
			"\t\t\t\t\tcarouselWrap.style.height = imgNodes.offsetHeight, \"px\";",
			"\t\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t\t\t//小圆点布局",
			"\t\t\t\tvar pointsWrap = document.querySelector(\".carousel-wrap > .points-wrap\");",
			"\t\t\t\tif (pointsWrap) {",
			"\t\t\t\t\tfor (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {",
			"\t\t\t\t\t\tif (i == 0) {",
			"\t\t\t\t\t\t\tpointsWrap.innerHTML+= '<span class=\"active\"></span>';",
			"\t\t\t\t\t\t} else {",
			"\t\t\t\t\t\t\tpointsWrap.innerHTML+= '<span></span>';",
			"\t\t\t\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t\t\t\tvar pointsSpan = document.querySelectorAll(\".carousel-wrap > .points-wrap > span\");",
			"\t\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t\t\t/*滑屏",
			"\t\t\t\t * \t1.拿到元素一开始的位置",
			"\t\t\t\t * \t2.拿到手指一开始点击的位置",
			"\t\t\t\t * \t3.拿到手指move的实时距离",
			"\t\t\t\t * \t4.将手指移动的距离加给元素",
			"\t\t\t\t * */",
			"\t\t\t\t//手指一开始的位置",
			"\t\t\t\tvar startX = 0;",
			"\t\t\t\t//元素一开始的位置",
			"\t\t\t\tvar elementX = 0;",
			"\t\t\t\t//1.增加元素坐标位置，由于translate的值不会记录到offsetleft中",
			"\t\t\t\tvar translateX = 0;",
			"\t\t\t\tcarouselWrap.addEventListener(\"touchstart\", function (ev) {",
			"\t\t\t\t\tev = ev || event;",
			"\t\t\t\t\tvar TouchC = ev.changedTouches[0];",
			"\t\t\t\t\t//清除动画延迟",
			"\t\t\t\t\tulNode.style.transition = \"none\";",
			"\t\t\t\t\tstartX = TouchC.clientX;",
			"\t\t\t\t\t//a.elementX=ulNode.offsetLeft;定位",
			"\t\t\t\t\telementX = translateX; //非定位",
			"\t\t\t\t})",
			"\t\t\t\tcarouselWrap.addEventListener(\"touchmove\", function (ev) {",
			"\t\t\t\t\tev = ev || event;",
			"\t\t\t\t\tvar TouchC = ev.changedTouches[0];",
			"\t\t\t\t\tvar nowX = TouchC.clientX;",
			"\t\t\t\t\tvar disX = nowX - startX;",
			"\t\t\t\t\ttranslateX = elementX, disX;",
			"\t\t\t\t\t//b.ulNode.style.left = elementX+disX+\"px\";//定位",
			"\t\t\t\t\tulNode.style.transform = 'translateX(', translateX, 'px)'; //非定位",
			"\t\t\t\t})",
			"\t\t\t\tcarouselWrap.addEventListener(\"touchend\", function (ev) {",
			"\t\t\t\t\tev = ev || event;",
			"\t\t\t\t\t//index抽象了ul的实时位置",
			"\t\t\t\t\t//2.不能用uloffsetLeft换成translateX",
			"\t\t\t\t\t//var index = ulNode.offsetLeft/document.documentElement.clientWidth;",
			"\t\t\t\t\tvar index = translateX / document.documentElement.clientWidth;",
			"\t\t\t\t\t//1/2滑动控制",
			"\t\t\t\t\tindex = Math.round(index);",
			"\t\t\t\t\t//无缝超出控制",
			"\t\t\t\t\tif (index > 0) {",
			"\t\t\t\t\t\tindex = 0;",
			"\t\t\t\t\t} else if (index < 1 - arr.length) {",
			"\t\t\t\t\t\tindex = 1 - arr.length;",
			"\t\t\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t\t\t\t//小点样式跟随",
			"\t\t\t\t\tfor (var i = 0; i < pointsSpan.length; i++) {",
			"\t\t\t\t\t\tpointsSpan[i].classList.remove(\"active\");",
			"\t\t\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t\t\t\tpointsSpan[-index].classList.add(\"active\");",
			"\t\t\t\t\t//过渡",
			"\t\t\t\t\tulNode.style.transition = \".5s left\";",
			"\t\t\t\t\t//3.同步translateX",
			"\t\t\t\t\ttranslateX = index * (document.documentElement.clientWidth);",
			"\t\t\t\t\t//c.ulNode.style.left = index*(document.documentElement.clientWidth)+\"px\";",
			"\t\t\t\t\tulNode.style.transform = 'translateX(', translateX, 'px)';",
			"\t\t\t\t})",
			"\t\t\t}",
			"\t\t}"
		],
		"description": "轮播图"
	},

	},
	"佛祖": {
		"prefix": "fz",
		"body": [
			"/*",
			"                   _ooOoo_",
			"                  o8888888o",
			"                  88\" . \"88",
			"                  (| -_- |)",
			"                  O\\  =  /O",
			"               ____/`---'\\____",
			"             .'  \\|     |//  `.",
			"            /  \\|||  :  |||//  \\",
			"           /  _||||| -:- |||||-  \\",
			"           |   | \\\\\\  -  /// |   |",
			"           | \\_|  ''\\---/''  |   |",
			"           \\  .-\\__  `-`  ___/-. /",
			"         ___`. .'  /--.--\\ `. . __",
			"      .\"\" '<  `.___\\_<|>_/___.'  >'\"\".",
			"     | | :  `- \\`.;`\\ _ /`;.`/ - ` : | |",
			"     \\  \\ `-.   \\_ __\\ /__ _/   .-` /  /",
			"======`-.____`-.___\\_____/___.-`____.-'======",
			"                   `=---='",
			"^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^",
			"            佛祖保佑       永无BUG",
			"//     佛曰:  ",
			"//          写字楼里写字间，写字间里程序员；",
			"//          程序人员写程序，又拿程序换酒钱。",
			"//          酒醒只在网上坐，酒醉还来网下眠；",
			"//          酒醉酒醒日复日，网上网下年复年。",
			"//          但愿老死电脑间，不愿鞠躬老板前；",
			"//          奔驰宝马贵者趣，公交自行程序员。",
			"//          别人笑我忒疯癫，我笑自己命太贱；",
			"//          不见满街漂亮妹，哪个归得程序员？",
			"*/"
		],
		"description": "佛祖"
	}
}

                                                                      1110

                                                                      # vscode片段之jsx

                                                                      {
	"zrcc" :{
		"prefix" :"zrcc",
		"body" :[
			"import React, { Component } from 'react';",
			"import { connect } from 'react-redux';",
			"",
			"",
			"class index extends Component {",
			"	render() {",
			"		return (",
			"			<div>",
			"				",
			"			</div>",
			"		);",
			"	}",
			"}",
			"",
			"const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({",
			"	",
			"})",
			"const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({",
			"	",
			"})",
			"",
			"export default connect(",
			"	mapStateToProps,",
			"	mapDispatchToProps",
			")(index);",
		]
	},
	"App" :{
		"prefix" :"App",
		"body" :[
			"import React, { Component } from 'react';",
			"import { GlobalStyle } from './style';",
			"import { GlobalStyledIconfont } from './statics/iconfont/iconfont';",
			"import { Provider } from 'react-redux';",
			"import { BrowserRouter,Route } from 'react-router-dom';",
			"import Header from './common/header';",
			"import Home from './pages/home';",
			"import store from './store';",
			"class App extends Component {",
			"render() {",
			"	return (",
			"	<Provider store={store}>",
			"		<BrowserRouter>",
			"		<div>",
			"			<GlobalStyle />",
			"			<GlobalStyledIconfont/>",
			"			<Header />",
			"			<Route path='/' exact component={Home}></Route>",
			"		</div>",
			"		</BrowserRouter>",
			"	</Provider>",
			"	);",
			"}",
			"}",
			"export default App;"
		]
	},
	"iconfonts" :{
		"prefix" :"iconfonts",
		"body" :[
			"import { createGlobalStyle } from 'styled-components';",
			"export const GlobalStyledIconfont = createGlobalStyle`",
			"@font-face {",
			"	font-family: 'iconfont';",
			"	src: url('./iconfont.eot?t=1528610804703'); /* IE9*/",
			"	src: url('./iconfont.eot?t=1528610804703#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'), /* IE6-IE8 */",
			"	url('data:application/x-font-woff;charset=utf-8;base64,d09GRgABAAAAAAawAAsAAAAACXQAAQAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAABHU1VCAAABCAAAADMAAABCsP6z7U9TLzIAAAE8AAAARAAAAFZW7ko/Y21hcAAAAYAAAAB+AAABwJ8cCDpnbHlmAAACAAAAApEAAAL0URYALWhlYWQAAASUAAAALwAAADYRpQXlaGhlYQAABMQAAAAcAAAAJAfeA4dobXR4AAAE4AAAABMAAAAYF+kAAGxvY2EAAAT0AAAADgAAAA4C3AHkbWF4cAAABQQAAAAfAAAAIAEVAF1uYW1lAAAFJAAAAUUAAAJtPlT+fXBvc3QAAAZsAAAAQgAAAFNcaMVWeJxjYGRgYOBikGPQYWB0cfMJYeBgYGGAAJAMY05meiJQDMoDyrGAaQ4gZoOIAgCKIwNPAHicY2Bk/sM4gYGVgYOpk+kMAwNDP4RmfM1gxMjBwMDEwMrMgBUEpLmmMDgwVLwIZG7438AQw9zA0AAUZgTJAQAq0wzDeJzFkTEKwzAMRZ9itxSTMblF5xygc5ZcpFMHn1jkFumXHQo9Qb54RvrIyFjADUjiKTLYByP0lmvNT5TmZ16qCw8GRfXZl307DnnVp1/eZeorjIrIk6Zk3cHuXCa7bvS/xnauZxX/X0/0RJ86sROfO9HjSyd2tG8dhi8XIxfqAAB4nDWSz2sTQRTH581kdtM02W33Z7L5nW12G1s3cbObiNpsChX8hRUEsQ0oCnqoKBYLvShEJBDFg2CPglAEr73UUy0ttP9ATz14sCiCx148tVs3aTszvOF934PPvPcGUYSO9sgaiSMRjaJzaArdQgiYMShwOA1507HwGMh5KqsSR0zdzLN6wSIToBYYSbFrjqEyLMMDBxmo5u2aaWETXKeBL4KtpAESSe22UEwJ5ANE4mam41/DyyBn9RTfOOtfHfckOyeGF6OCkBCE92GG0jDGIZ6Dp6oyQAcijP+F8pq8li3hLEQTpnZjJpZLCg+6zrN0UR0AaLdBTOa4r96wNhycl5oiCgl2KBaOazF9RILF34NxMZo2fqFg4aDWNgk2GkL5oEo2AzIHrMuqbgPqjlHuu5Ki1i3oKTI+mLUqZLXbbq8f0qmDvm0eS/j7rLUw2V0lzXa7SQ/XW8tvTu7maaDP2yQbZBLJPR6FBrgWmFwPrNq1OvQaGIj1wA1EC8g3f98oka2lpa1QaGvJm7eAj2jSwXJopdNZIaRnWeCt595xwsdtcsbw9yOSBv86K6HTrF6toYB9FLARYhGPRlAZoXx/elAViWHqDEtorWqnQXd1Ri8YruOBoxfY4CGypFTt2gTgjcdX/N3Lj4B/OPWEMpiyc7Bbabw4D/lJqz53r3mhfH80ndOKlZ0dgvwSeEOGLvqbNLWwXa5VSne46PXiXZpKyCm7mDnp/2syQ14hDhkIeQAeXALdNBiZB1AZHjPBDESjHugNrGSDP8X6n4EkXHgL2MX+n59R+Uc4ZYdxAkchSZ3BnDkqdIuKHJuHjfEW4GkAaIX8+Dsp8gmz6VQYoqoEfyMtIT7IRG6q0wH3P3/XmCcAAAB4nGNgZGBgAOKzF3Kd4/ltvjJwszCAwHWnB18Q9P8GFgbmBiCXg4EJJAoAVtsL6AB4nGNgZGBgbvjfwBDDwgACQJKRARWwAQBHDAJveJxjYWBgYH7JwMDCgIoBEp8BAQAAAAAAAHYArgDsATYBegAAeJxjYGRgYGBjCGRgZQABJiDmAkIGhv9gPgMAEUgBcwB4nGWPTU7DMBCFX/oHpBKqqGCH5AViASj9EatuWFRq911036ZOmyqJI8et1ANwHo7ACTgC3IA78EgnmzaWx9+8eWNPANzgBx6O3y33kT1cMjtyDRe4F65TfxBukF+Em2jjVbhF/U3YxzOmwm10YXmD17hi9oR3YQ8dfAjXcI1P4Tr1L+EG+Vu4iTv8CrfQ8erCPuZeV7iNRy/2x1YvnF6p5UHFockikzm/gple75KFrdLqnGtbxCZTg6BfSVOdaVvdU+zXQ+ciFVmTqgmrOkmMyq3Z6tAFG+fyUa8XiR6EJuVYY/62xgKOcQWFJQ6MMUIYZIjK6Og7VWb0r7FDwl57Vj3N53RbFNT/c4UBAvTPXFO6stJ5Ok+BPV8bUnV0K27LnpQ0kV7NSRKyQl7WtlRC6gE2ZVeOEXpc0Yk/KGdI/wAJWm7IAAAAeJxjYGKAAC4G7ICNkYmRmZGFkZWRjZGdgbGCpbggM48rLTEvPSUxKzMvnckxkSczOT9PNzkjNTk7M4+BAQDkRwvZAAA=') format('woff'),",
			"	url('./iconfont.ttf?t=1528610804703') format('truetype'), /* chrome, firefox, opera, Safari, Android, iOS 4.2+*/",
			"	url('./iconfont.svg?t=1528610804703#iconfont') format('svg'); /* iOS 4.1- */",
			"}",
			".iconfont {",
			"	font-family:'iconfont' !important;",
			"	font-size:16px;",
			"	font-style:normal;",
			"	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;",
			"	-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;",
			"}",
			"`;",
		]
	},
	"globals" :{
		"prefix" :"globals",
		"body" :[
			"import {createGlobalStyle} from 'styled-components';",
			"export const GlobalStyle = createGlobalStyle`",
			"	html, body, div, span, applet, object, iframe,",
			"	h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, blockquote, pre,",
			"	a, abbr, acronym, address, big, cite, code,",
			"	del, dfn, em, img, ins, kbd, q, s, samp,",
			"	small, strike, strong, sub, sup, tt, var,",
			"	b, u, i, center,",
			"	dl, dt, dd, ol, ul, li,",
			"	fieldset, form, label, legend,",
			"	table, caption, tbody, tfoot, thead, tr, th, td,",
			"	article, aside, canvas, details, embed, ",
			"	figure, figcaption, footer, header, hgroup, ",
			"	menu, nav, output, ruby, section, summary,",
			"	time, mark, audio, video {",
			"		margin: 0;",
			"		padding: 0;",
			"		border: 0;",
			"		font-size: 100%;",
			"		font: inherit;",
			"		vertical-align: baseline;",
			"	}",
			"	/* HTML5 display-role reset for older browsers */",
			"	article, aside, details, figcaption, figure, ",
			"	footer, header, hgroup, menu, nav, section {",
			"		display: block;",
			"	}",
			"	body {",
			"		line-height: 1;",
			"	}",
			"	ol, ul {",
			"		list-style: none;",
			"	}",
			"	blockquote, q {",
			"		quotes: none;",
			"	}",
			"	blockquote:before, blockquote:after,",
			"	q:before, q:after {",
			"		content: '';",
			"		content: none;",
			"	}",
			"	table {",
			"		border-collapse: collapse;",
			"		border-spacing: 0;",
			"	}",
			"`;",
		]
	},
	"zreducer" :{
		"prefix" :"zreducer",
		"body" :[
			"import { fromJS } from 'immutable';",
			"import * as constants from './constants';",
			"const defaultState = fromJS({",
			"topicList: [],",
			"articleList: [],",
			"recommendList: [],",
			"articlePage: 1,",
			"showScroll: false",
			"});",
			"export default (state = defaultState, action) => {",
			"switch (action.type) {",
			"	case constants.CHANGE_HOME_DATA:",
			"	return changeHomeData(state, action);",
			"	case constants.TOGGLE_SCROLL_TOP:",
			"	return state.set('showScroll', action.show);",
			"	case constants.ADD_ARTICLE_LIST:",
			"			return addArticleList(state, action);",
			"	default:",
			"	return state;",
			"}",
			"}",
		]
	},
	"comb" :{
		"prefix" :"comb",
		"body" :[
			"import { combineReducers } from 'redux-immutable';",
			"import { reducer as headerReducer } from '../common/header/store';",
			"// import { reducer as detailReducer } from '../pages/detail/store';",
			"import { reducer as homeReducer } from '../pages/home/store';",
			"// import { reducer as loginReducer } from '../pages/login/store';",
			"const reducer=combineReducers({",
			"	header:headerReducer,",
			"	// detail:detailReducer,",
			"	// login:loginReducer,",
			"	home:homeReducer",
			"})",
			"export default reducer",
		]
	},
	"cstore" :{
		"prefix" :"cstore",
		"body" :[
			"import {createStore,applyMiddleware,compose} from 'redux'",
			"import thunk from 'redux-thunk'",
			"import reducer from './reducer';",
			"const composeEnchancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;",
			"const store=createStore(reducer,composeEnchancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)))",
			"export default store",
		]
	},
	"sstore" :{
		"prefix" :"sstore",
		"body" :[
			"import reducer from './reducer';",
			"import * as actionCreators from './actionCreators';",
			"import * as constants from './constants';",
			"export { reducer, actionCreators, constants };",
		]
	},
	"actionc" :{
		"prefix" :"actionc",
		"body" :[
			"import axios from 'axios';",
			"import * as constants from './constants';",
			"import { fromJS } from 'immutable';",
			"export const getHomeInfo = () => {",
			"	return (dispatch) => {",
			"		axios.get('/api/home.json').then((res) => {",
			"			const result = res.data.data;",
			"			dispatch(changHomeData(result));",
			"		});",
			"	}",
			"}",
			"export const toggleTopShow = (show) => ({",
			"	type: constants.TOGGLE_SCROLL_TOP,",
			"	show",
			"})",
		]
	},
	"constants" :{
		"prefix" :"constants",
		"body" :[
			"export const CHANGE_HOME_DATA = 'home/CHANGE_HOME_DATA'"
		]
	},
	"mstp" :{
		"prefix" :"rs",
		"body" :[
			"const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({",
			"    $1",
			"})"
		]
	},
	"mdtp" :{
		"prefix" :"rd",
		"body" :[
			"const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({",
			"    $1",
			"})"
		]
	},
	// "rcc" :{
	// 	"prefix" :"rcc",
	// 	"body" :[
	// 		"import React, { Component } from 'react'",
	// 		"class ${1:componentName} extends Component {",
	// 		"    render() {",
	// 		"        return (",
	// 		"            <div>",
	// 		"                 $3",
	// 		"            </div>",
	// 		"        )",
	// 			"}",
	// 		"}",
	// 		"export default ${2:componentName}"
	// 	]
	// },

}

                                                                      # vuecli3配置

                                                                      const {
  NODE_ENV
} = process.env;
const path = require('path');
const CompressionWebpackPlugin = require('compression-webpack-plugin');
const productionGzipExtensions = ['js', 'css'];
const isProduction = process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production';
const UglifyJsPlugin = require('uglifyjs-webpack-plugin')
const webpack = require('webpack')
function resolve(dir) {
  return path.join(__dirname, dir)
}
module.exports = {
  productionSourceMap: true,
  // indexPath:index.html,
  // assetsDir:"",
  // outputDir: '../dist',
  // productionSourceMap: true,
  // lintOnSave: false,
  // baseUrl: './',//已废弃
  publicPath:
  //  NODE_ENV == 'production' ? '//grid.pcitech.com/wxfwpt/html/dist/' : '/', //公司外网路径
  // NODE_ENV == 'production' ? '//172.25.20.50/wxfwpt/html/dist/' : '/', //公司内网路径
  //  NODE_ENV == 'production' ? 'http://hpzzsb.hp.gov.cn/wxfwpt/html/dist/' : '/', //生产环境
  // NODE_ENV == 'production' ? '//grid.pcitech.com/zzsb/' : '/', //nginx路径
  NODE_ENV == 'production' ? '/zzsb/' : '/', //腾讯云路径
  devServer: {
    // proxy: 'http://sts-c.com.cn/',//代理公司外网
    // proxy: 'http://sts-c.com.cn/wxtx/',//代理公司内网
    proxy: 'http://172.25.20.50', //代理生产
    // proxy: 'http://localhost:9080',//代理本地
    // proxy: { //代理公司内网，外网出问题切内网，不管打包模式为内网或者外网模式，开发模式只需要修改proxy，也可以说使用这个proxy即可
    //   '/wxtx': {
    //     ws: false,
    //     target: 'http://172.25.20.50',
    //     pathRewrite: { '^/wxtx': '' }
    //   },
    //   '/': {
    //     ws: false,
    //     target: 'http://172.25.20.50',
    //   }
    // },
    // overlay: {
    //  warnings: true,
    //  errors: true
    // },
    // hotReload:true,
    // productionSourceMap:false,
    // runtimeCompiler:false,
    // host: '0.0.0.0',
    // port: 9000,
    // https: false, // https:{type:Boolean}
    // open: true
  },
  chainWebpack: config => {
    config.externals({
      jquery: "jQuery",
    });
    // 压缩图片
    config.module.rule('images').use('image-webpack-loader').loader('image-webpack-loader').options({ bypassOnDebug: true }).end();
    // config.entry.app = ["babel-polyfill", resolve('src/main.js')],
    config.resolve.alias.set('@', resolve('src'));
    config.resolve.modules.add(resolve('src')).add(resolve('node_modules'));
    if (isProduction) {
      if (process.env.npm_config_report) {
        config.plugin('webpack-bundle-analyzer').use(require('webpack-bundle-analyzer').BundleAnalyzerPlugin).end();
        config.plugins.delete('prefetch')
      }
    }
    // .set('loadScript', 'loadScript').set('./@assets', resolve('src/assets')).set('@components', resolve('src/components')).set('@font', resolve('src/font'));
  },
  configureWebpack: config => {
    // devtool: '#eval-source-map',
    // 开起gzip
    if (isProduction) {
      config.plugins.push(new CompressionWebpackPlugin({
        algorithm: 'gzip',
        test: new RegExp('\\.(' + productionGzipExtensions.join('|') + ')),
        threshold: 10240, // 只有大小大于该值的资源会被处理 10240
        minRatio: 0.8 // 只有压缩率小于这个值的资源才会被处理
          // deleteOriginalAssets: false // 删除原文件
      }))
      // 最大化压缩
    config.plugins.push(new UglifyJsPlugin({
        uglifyOptions: {
          //生产环境自动删除console
          compress: {
            // warnings: false, // 若打包错误，则注释这行
            drop_debugger: true,
            drop_console: true,
            pure_funcs: ['console.log']
          }
        },
        sourceMap: false,
        parallel: true
      }))
    } else {
      config.devtool = '#eval-source-map'
    }
    // output: {
    //   library: 'someLibName',
    //   libraryTarget: 'umd',
    //   filename: 'someLibName.js',
    //   auxiliaryComment: 'Test Comment',
    //   path: path.resolve(__dirname, 'dist/assets'),
    //   filename: '[name].[hash].bundle.js',
    //   filename: '[chunkhash].bundle.js',
    //   filename: '[contenthash].bundle.css'
    // },
    // devServer: {
    // color:true,
    // progress:true,
    // clientLogLevel: 'warning',
    // quiet: true,
    // noInfo: true,
    // compress: true,
    // lazy: true,
    // host: 'localhost',
    // port: 8080,
    // public:'myapp.test:80',
    // publicPath:"/",
    // index: 'index.html',
    // contentBase: [path.join(__dirname, "public"), path.join(__dirname, "assets")],
    // contentBase: path.join(__dirname, "public"),
    // open: true,
    // open: 'Google Chrome',//'Chrome' is 'Google Chrome' on macOS, 'google-chrome' on Linux and 'chrome' on Windows.
    // openPage: '/different/page',
    // allowedHosts: ['host.com', 'subdomain.host.com', 'subdomain2.host.com', 'host2.com'],
    // after: function(app, server) {
    //    do fancy stuff
    // },
    // before: function(app, server) {
    //   app.get('/some/path', function(req, res) {
    //     res.json({ custom: 'response' });
    //   });
    // },
    // overlay: {
    //   warnings: true,
    //   errors: true
    // },
    // headers: {
    //   'X-Custom-Foo': 'bar'
    // },
    // historyApiFallback: true,
    // historyApiFallback: {
    //   rewrites: [{ from: /^\/subpage/, to: '/views/subpage.html' }, {
    //     from: /^\/helloWorld\/.*$/,
    //     to: function() {
    //       return '/views/hello_world.html;
    //     }
    //   }],
    //   verbose: true, //激活日志记录
    //   disableDotRule: true, // 禁止 url 带小数点 .
    // },
    // serveIndex: true,//没有index.html文件的目录上生成目录列表。
    // watchOptions: {
    //   poll: true
    // },
    // watchContentBase: true,//默认情况下禁用它。启用后，文件更改将触发整页重新加载。
    // hot: true,
    // hotOnly: true,
    // liveReload: false,启用后，文件更改将触发整页重新加载
    // useLocalIp: true,//启用ip访问
    // http2: true,
    // https: {
    //   key: fs.readFileSync('/path/to/server.key'),
    //   cert: fs.readFileSync('/path/to/server.crt'),
    //   ca: fs.readFileSync('/path/to/ca.pem'),
    // },
    // https: true,
    // proxy: {
    //   '/api1': {
    //     target: 'http://localhost:3000',
    //     pathRewrite: {'^/api' : ''}
    //   },
    //   '/api2': {
    //     target: 'http://localhost:3000',
    //     secure: false,
    //     changeOrigin: true,
    //     bypass: function(req, res, proxyOptions) {
    //       if (req.headers.accept.indexOf('html') !== -1) {
    //         console.log('Skipping proxy for browser request.');
    //         return '/index.html';
    //       }
    //     }
    //   },
    // },
    // proxy: [{
    //   context: ['/auth', '/api'],
    //   context: () => true,
    //   target: 'http://localhost:3000',
    // }]
    // },
    // plugins: [
    //   new webpack.ProvidePlugin({
    //       jQuery: 'jquery',
    //       $: 'jquery'
    //   }),
    //   new webpack.DefinePlugin({
    //   'process.env': {
    //     NODE_ENV: '"production"'
    //   },
    //   }),
    //   new webpack.optimize.UglifyJsPlugin()
    //     ],
    // module: {
    //   rules: [
    //     {
    //       test: '\.vue,
    //       loader: 'vue-loader',
    //       options: {
    // cssModules: {
    //   localIdentName: '[path][name]---[local]---[hash:base64:5]',
    //   camelCase: true
    // },
    // extractCSS:true,
    // cssSourceMap:true,
    // hotReload:true,
    // preserveWhitespace:true,//如果设置为 false，模版中 HTML 标签之间的空格将会被忽略。
    // loaders: {
    //   scss: 'vue-style-loader!css-loader!sass-loader', // <style lang="scss">
    //   sass: 'vue-style-loader!css-loader!sass-loader?indentedSyntax', // <style lang="sass">
    //   js: 'coffee-loader //会导致所有无 `lang` 特性的 `<script>` 标签加载 `coffee-loader,
    //   js: [
    //     { loader: 'cache-loader' },
    //     { loader: 'babel-loader', options: { presets: ['env'] } }
    //   ]
    // }
    // 默认lang
    // <template>: html
    // <script>: js
    // <style>: css
    // `preLoaders` 会在默认 loaders 之前加载。
    // 你可以用来预处理语言块——一个例子是用来处理构建时的 i18n
    // preLoaders: {
    //   js: '/path/to/custom/loader'
    // },
    // `postLoaders` 会在默认 loaders 之后加载。 - 对于 `html` , 默认 loader 返回会编译为 JavaScript 渲染函数
    // postLoaders: {
    //   html: 'babel-loader'
    // },
    // `excludedPreLoaders` 应是正则表达式
    //  excludedPreLoaders: /(eslint-loader)/
    // hotReload: false,
    // postcss: [require('postcss-cssnext')()],
    // postcss: {
    //   useConfigFile: false,//禁止自动加载配置文件,提高内联优先级
    // config: {
    //   path: path.resolve('./src')
    // }
    //   plugins: [...], // 插件列表
    //   options: {
    //     parser: 'sugarss' // 使用 sugarss 解析器
    //   }
    // }
    //     }
    //   }
    // ]
  },
  transpileDependencies: [
    'vue-echarts',
    'resize-detector'
  ]
  // css: {
  //   modules:true,
  //   extract:true,
  //   sourceMap:false,
  //   loaderOptions:{
  //     css: {
  //       //这里的选项会传递给 css-loader
  //       //localIdentName: '[name]-[hash]',
  //       localIdentName: '[hash:base64]',
  //       camelCase: 'only',
  //       modules: true,
  //       importLoaders: 1,
  //     },
  //     postcss: {
  //       //这里的选项会传递给 postcss-loader
  //     },
  //     sass: {
  //       data: `@import "~@/variables.sass"`
  //     },
  //     //默认情况下 `sass` 选项会同时对 `sass` 和 `scss` 语法同时生效
  //     //因为 `scss` 语法在内部也是由 sass-loader 处理的
  //     //但是在配置 `data` 选项的时候
  //     // `scss` 语法会要求语句结尾必须有分号， `sass` 则要求必须没有分号
  //     //在这种情况下，我们可以使用 `scss` 选项，对 `scss` 语法进行单独配置
  //     scss: {
  //       data: `@import "~@/variables.scss";`
  //     },
  //     //给 less-loader 传递 Less.js 相关选项
  //     less:{
  //       globalVars: {
  //         primary: '#fff'
  //       },
  //     }
  //   }
  // }
};
